trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBindingCollection 클래스는 저장 하 고 컬렉션을 관리 하는 데 사용 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeBindingCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>컨트롤에 대 한 TreeNodeBindingCollection 클래스를 사용 하 여 해당 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>속성 포함 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>데이터 항목과 데이터 항목이 바인딩되는 노드 간의 관계를 정의 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 노드를 각 데이터 항목 (예: XML 요소가 아닌 여러 특성이 있는) 여러 속성에 포함 된 데이터 소스에 바인딩할에서 반환 되는 값을 표시 하는 경우는 `ToString` 메서드 기본적으로 데이터 항목의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: XML 요소의 경우 노드 트리의 기본 구조를 표시 하지만 그렇지 않은 경우 매우 유용 하지 않습니다 요소 이름이 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드 바인딩을 지정 하 여 노드는 특정 데이터 항목 속성에 바인딩할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>일반적으로 설정 선언적으로, 컬렉션을 프로그래밍 방식으로 채울 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the tree node bindings declaratively: 1.
trans-unit.target: 트리 노드 바인딩을 설정 하려면 선언적으로: 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Nest opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 중첩 중괄호와 닫는 `<DataBindings>` 여는 태그와 닫는 태그 사이 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Place `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elements between the opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags for each tree node binding that you want to specify.
trans-unit.target: 현재 위치 `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` 열기 및 닫기 간에 요소 `<DataBindings>` 지정 하려면 각 트리 노드 바인딩에 대 한 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage a TreeNodeBindingCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBindingCollection 추가 및 제거 하 여 프로그래밍 방식으로 관리할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체를 사용 하 여 컬렉션에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 노드를 제거 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBindingCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBindingCollection 클래스를 사용 하는 컬렉션의 항목에 액세스 하는 여러 방법을 지원:-사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>검색할 인덱서의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>특정 인덱스에서 직접 개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드는 컬렉션을 반복 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 열거자를 만드는.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 추가 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체의 끝에는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Add 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 추가할 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체의 끝에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 삽입할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>사용 하 여 특정 인덱스에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to append.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 추가할 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the location of the added <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 추가 된 위치의&0;부터 시작 인덱스 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 결정 하는지 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체 컬렉션에에서 포함 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Contains 메서드를 사용 하 여 확인 여부는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체에 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는의 존재 여부를 테스트 하는 데 주로 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체 추가 또는 제거 등의 작업을 수행 하기 전에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>컬렉션에서.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 찾으려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 는 컬렉션에 있으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: 모든 항목을 복사는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 호환 가능한&1; 차원 배열에 개체 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 대상 배열의 지정된 된 인덱스부터 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object into `bindingArray`.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 메서드를 사용 하 여의 내용을 복사 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체 `bindingArray`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at `index`.
trans-unit.target: 시작 항목은 복사 `index`합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the array to access the items that are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 다음 컬렉션에 있는 항목에 액세스 하는 배열을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>컬렉션의 항목에 액세스를 사용할 수 있는 열거자를 만드는 방법.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 배열 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체에서 복사한 항목을 수신 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position in `bindingArray` at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: 위치 `bindingArray` 복사 된 내용을 받기 시작 하는입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 인덱스를 결정 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스를 확인 하려면 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 노드 컬렉션에 없는 경우-1이 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 경우 지정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>컬렉션에 여러 번 표시 하는 개체를 처음 나타나는 인덱스 반환 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 찾으려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of binding within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째로 나타나는 항목의&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스 binding 내에서 이거나, 없는 경우, 그렇지 않으면-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 삽입 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스 위치에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Insert 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 삽입 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체에 `index`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체의 끝에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 삽입할&0;부터 시작 인덱스 위치는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 를 삽입 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object located at `i` using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 항목 인덱서를 사용 하 여 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체에 있는 `i` 배열 표기법을 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 항목 인덱서를 사용 하면 수정 하거나 바꿀 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체 컬렉션에서 직접.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 에 지정된 된 인덱스에는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 제거 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 에서 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove 메서드를 사용 하 여 지정 된 제거 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체를 컬렉션에서.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 해당 노드 아래에 있는 모든 항목은 다음 위로 이동 하 여 빈 자리를 채웁니다.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 이동된 된 항목의 인덱스도 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 특정 인덱스에 있는 노드를 제거할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 모든 노드를 제거할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 를 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스 위치는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object located at `index` from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: RemoveAt 메서드를 사용 하 여 제거 하 고 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>개체에 있는 `index` 에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 해당 노드 아래에 있는 모든 항목은 다음 위로 이동 하 여 빈 자리를 채웁니다.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 이동된 된 항목의 인덱스도 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대신 특정을 제거할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>사용 하 여 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 모든 노드를 제거할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 인덱스 위치는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"> </xref> 를 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
